column1: Gharaunda is a town and a municipal committee  in Karnal district  in the state of Haryana
column2: India. It is situated at a distance of sixty-five miles to the northwest of New Delhi. It is eleven miles from Karnal
column3: the district headquarters. The Amritsar-Delhi main broad-gauge railway line passes through the town. Indo-Israel Centre For Excellence in Vegetables and one of the leading footwear industries of India 'Liberty Shoes' has its manufacturing unit in Gharaunda. This has given fame to the place. Gharaunda is also a very big Grain market of the state.
